1.0.name: wordpress/wpstart
1.0.description: WPstart is a responsive, simple, WordPress Theme built with HTML5 and CSS3. WPstart looks great on any device and allow you to create any type of website you want. WPstart features: cross-browser compatible, custom background, developer friendly, drop-down menu, editor styles, fast loading, header image, highly customizable and adaptable, Multisite ready, post formats support, print styles, responsive, Search Engine Friendly, threaded comments, translation ready, W3C valid, 7 widget-ready areas & more... WPstart is currently translated into 13 languages: Arabic (ar), Catalan (ca), Chinese (zh_CN), Danish (da_DK), Dutch (nl_NL), French (fr_FR), German (de_DE), Italian (it_IT), Japanese (ja), Portuguese (pt_PT), Russian (ru_RU), Spanish (es_ES). Everyone from first-time WordPress users to advanced developers and designers can take advantage of WPstart.
